# PLAYER::REMOVE_PLAYER_HELMET

## Summary
Will remove the players helmet if they have one

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **BOOL** forceRemove:
Is set to TRUE, instantly removes helmet in a pop.
If set to FALSE, will take it off in the same way that getting on/off bikes do â€“ playing animation etc.
